divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at the "Big-Dipper" and saw this "star" that started moving away from the lower part of the Big dipper. I live near a local airport, and see a lot of planes that fly from DIA. All of which have flashing lights. This thing moved like a satellite...but a lot quicker. It was far enough away to look like a star. I guess it move North East.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were no other sightings in Longmont on or around April 29th 2010
Summary: It looked like part of the Big Dipper, until it started movin away...
